items.title: King Charles pours 'perfect pint' at new brewery
items.description: King Charles visited a new Guinness brewery in London on his first visit since sharing "good news" about his cancer treatment.

items.title: Zelensky gives stark warning as EU leaders hold crunch talks on Russia's frozen assets
items.description: The EU is deciding whether to loan tens of billions of euros of Russian money to fund Ukraine's military and economic needs.

items.title: Trump Media to merge with nuclear fusion firm in $6bn deal
items.description: The company behind President Trump's Truth Social platform makes a surprising move into the energy sector.

items.title: Waterloo Road actor William Rush dies aged 31
items.description: Rush also starred in Grange Hill and Vera, and was the son of Coronation Street star Debbie Rush.

items.title: Worst start in Old Firm history - how does Celtic manager Nancy compare?
items.description: Wilfried Nancy is the first Old Firm boss to lose his opening four matches - can he recover Celtic's season and survive?
